name: Field Commander
description: The Field Commander is a strategic leader in battle, embodying athleticism and charisma, clad in breastplate and shield.
memorable: Its ability to protect and bolster allies with powerful auras and spells makes it a pivotal force in combat.
goals: To lead and support allies in battle, enhancing their capabilities and coordinating tactics.
relations: Often found commanding groups of soldiers or allied creatures, working with other leaders.
environment: Typically found on battlefields or war camps, often rallying troops.
strengths: High Strength and Charisma allow for powerful melee attacks and effective spellcasting.
weaknesses: Struggles with perception and lacks certain skills despite overall combat prowess.
attacks: Uses a longsword to deal slashing damage plus additional necrotic or radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Courage and Protection grants allies immunity to frightened effects and advantages on their saving throws.
equipment: Wields a longsword, wears a breastplate, and uses a shield.
skills: Possesses average skills in perception with a +1 modifier.
additional_information: Can cast a variety of spells at will to influence the battlefield.
Ability to revive fallen allies once per day with Revivify.
Can grant temporary hit points to allies when they are attacked.
spellcasting: Charisma-based casting with spell save DC of 16, capable of casting spells such as Command and Protection from Evil and Good.
test_queries: human commander with powerful battle cry
military leader granting temporary hit points
